title: Mina no Mura no Gomi Soudou
synopsis: Mina's family has a baby goat, but it dies from eating a plastic bag left in the paddy field. Some children are absent from school due to health problems caused by waste. So, the villagers have a meeting to discuss what they can do to improve waste management.
related_anime: ['Mina no Bousai Mura Dzukuri', 'Mina no Mura to Mori']
